effect.name: PixelPalette (Multi Palette retarget for BG)
effect.author: TimmyTopHat, Edit by NaitorStudios
effect.description: Change a palette to another, missing colors will not be changed. DX9 limited to 32 colors, DX11 limited to 256 colors. Both requires a texture with 256x2 pixels. It doesn't play well with Blend Coef on DX11 Premultiplied, use the parameter instead.

parameter.name: Palettes
parameter.description: A palette with 256px of width, use each row for a new palette. First line will be the original colors followed by the replacements in the second line.

parameter.name: Palette amount
parameter.description: The amount of rows (including the original colors in the fist row)

parameter.name: Mix Value
parameter.description: Mixes the colors between Palette A and B.
